testcase.system-out: * def data = read('data.json')..............................................passed * def size1 = (data.Contents.Contents.length)...............................passed * def size2 = get data.Contents.Contents.length()...........................passed * assert size1 == size2.....................................................passed * def index = Math.floor(Math.random() * size1).............................passed * print 'selected index: ' + index..........................................passed * def item = (data.Contents.Contents[index])................................passed * def children_uuids = item.children_uuids..................................passed * match children_uuids == { item: ['item1_uuid', 'item2_uuid'] }............passed
